trans-unit.source: Represents the shared-connection version of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowCommitWorkBatchService" /> service used by the runtime.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta la versione per connessione condivisa del servizio <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowCommitWorkBatchService" /> utilizzata dal runtime.

trans-unit.source: In this context, shared-connection means that the service uses the same SQL connection for both the tracking and persistence services.
trans-unit.target: In questo contesto, connessione condivisa indica che il servizio utilizza la stessa connessione SQL per i servizi di rilevamento e di persistenza.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService> service is used for database transactions that use a shared connection between different objects.
trans-unit.target: Il servizio <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService> viene utilizzato per le transazioni del database che utilizzano una connessione condivisa tra oggetti diversi.

trans-unit.source: To use the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService> instead of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.DefaultWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService> in your <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> instance, use the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.AddService%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Per utilizzare <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService> anziché <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.DefaultWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService> nell'istanza di <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>, utilizzare il metodo <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.AddService%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If the SQL server used by the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService> is down such as that caused by SQL cluster failovers or intermittent network issues, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService> will retry the commit process up to 20 times before raising a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled> event.
trans-unit.target: Se il server SQL utilizzato da <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService> è inattivo, ad esempio a causa di failover del cluster SQL o di problemi intermittenti della rete, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService> ritenterà il processo di commit fino a 20 volte prima di generare un evento <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService" />.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The constructor is invoked when the workflow runtime engine loads services from an application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Il costruttore viene richiamato quando il motore di runtime del flusso di lavoro carica servizi da un file di configurazione dell'applicazione.

trans-unit.source: The valid key is <c>EnableRetries</c>.
trans-unit.target: La chiave valida è <c>EnableRetries</c>.

trans-unit.source: This requests that the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService" /> retry in case of a failed database connection.
trans-unit.target: Viene richiesto che venga effettuato un nuovo tentativo da parte dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService" /> se la connessione al database non riesce.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService" />.

trans-unit.source: Database connection string.
trans-unit.target: Stringa di connessione al database.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService" /> class using a database connection string.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService" /> utilizzando una stringa di connessione al database.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowCommitWorkBatchService.CommitWorkBatchCallback" /> delegate to call to commit the work batch.
trans-unit.target: Delegato <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowCommitWorkBatchService.CommitWorkBatchCallback" /> da chiamare per eseguire il commit del batch di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: Creates a transaction if one does not exist.
trans-unit.target: Crea una transazione se non ne esiste una.

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets a value specifying whether the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService" /> will retry committing a work batch.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene e imposta un valore che specifica se <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService" /> ritenterà l'esecuzione del commit di un batch di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the service should retry committing the work batch; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se il servizio deve ritentare l'esecuzione del commit del batch di lavoro; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Retries of work batch commits for <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TransactionScopeActivity> activities must be modeled into the workflow (usually using a while loop and exception handler outside of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TransactionScopeActivity>).
trans-unit.target: I tentativi di commit del batch di lavoro per le attività <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TransactionScopeActivity> devono essere definiti nel flusso di lavoro (in genere utilizzando un ciclo while e un gestore eccezioni all'esterno di <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TransactionScopeActivity>).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService> cannot do retries in this case because it did not start (and therefore does not own) the transaction.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService> non può eseguire tentativi in questo caso poiché non ha avviato (e pertanto non possiede) la transazione.

trans-unit.source: Besides being set programmatically, this functionality can be enabled through a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Oltre a essere impostata a livello di programmazione, questa funzionalità può essere abilitata tramite un file di configurazione.

trans-unit.source: For more information on how to set this property through a configuration file, see [Workflow Configuration Files](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ada4bb90-6c9d-4f3d-a9d0-b559bb0f9909).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni su come impostare questa proprietà tramite un file di configurazione, vedere [i file di configurazione del flusso di lavoro](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ada4bb90-6c9d-4f3d-a9d0-b559bb0f9909).

trans-unit.source: For general information on retrying work batch transactions, see [Batching State Information in Workflows](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ecda18ba-9140-4bd7-b13d-6787fdf5959d).
trans-unit.target: Per informazioni generali sul nuovo tentativo in corso transazioni di batch di lavoro, vedere [informazioni sullo stato dell'invio in batch nei flussi di lavoro](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ecda18ba-9140-4bd7-b13d-6787fdf5959d).

trans-unit.source: Represents the method called when the workflow runtime raises the <see cref="E:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta il metodo chiamato quando il runtime del flusso di lavoro genera l'evento <see cref="E:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped" />.

trans-unit.source: Represents the method called to start the service.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta il metodo chiamato per avviare il servizio.
